file_content.text: Damn.
You're not going to let one little battle scar hold you back, are you?
It's not so bad. Tough it out.
When you look at your target, is there a face you see?
Is the dummy a stand-in?
You should have someone look at that.
Still in pain?
I'll heal.
I was right to reach out to Senya. I hope you see that.
You could have let me know we had backup on the way.
Why didn't you tell me?
We met shortly after I arrived in Wild Space. Senya was hunting Koth, I was hoping to learn your fate....
We exchanged what information we could. This was all before I really knew Koth, of course. Years ago.
She's a good fighter, she helped us raise the Gravestone.... I'd say she's an asset.
Senya's good for us.
She's coarse, belligerent.... I'm not convinced.
She seems like trouble.
You were looking for me all that time?
[Flirt] You really care.
In spite of our differences, you're my ally. I would even venture to call you my friend.
I've always seen the potential for something more between us.
I won't lie: the thought has crossed my mind. On more than one occasion....
I was looking for a... hyperdrive matrix processor assembly.
You may want to look in on Koth.
And you should get to know Senya. I'm not sure if you'll hit it off, exactly, but I think you'll find her intriguing.
Your display of power, it concerns me. Deeply.
I hope you've considered that its use must come at a cost. A very personal cost.
I'll be careful.
I know.
I'm in control, and I'll always be in control.
Don't underestimate me.
I wasn't about to let you die.
You were in danger.
I'm still trying to wrap my head around what took place out there. One moment there were Knights, and the next....
What do you suppose happened?
Your guess is as good as mine.
[Lie] No idea.
It could be Senya's been less than forthcoming about her capabilities.
[Lie] Maybe Senya?
She's powerful, but not nearly that powerful. I don't know of anyone alive who is.
There could be weapons on this ship that we don't know about.
[Lie] Maybe the Gravestone?
Koth was on his way outside, and I don't think HK would know his way around the controls....
It's cause to be unsettled, of that I'm certain. Just as I'm certain I was right in asking Senya to join us.
Most certainly not.
Have you gotten to know Senya yet?
You really should speak to Koth.
You're hardly putting me at ease.
No life is worth risking total corruption.
I wouldn't be so certain.
Valkorion may prove to be of some use, but he's no less dangerous than when he was alive.
That's why we need all the help we can get--and Senya will be a great help. I hope you can see that.
Always someone I find infuriating. A number of people take turns. It's therapeutic.
Wounds are fuel. Don't be wasteful.
Use the pain.
It's all right, I have plenty of fuel left.
And she doesn't give up, either. That was clear the first time I encountered her.
She's driven. I learned as much when I first encountered her.
I wanted you to encounter her without my guidance. To see if you saw her as I did.
Those two will have to get past their differences.
We all need to get along.
It won't be easy....
None of this is right. We have to set things back to the way they were.
We need the old paradigm back.
I wouldn't want to be your enemy again, but I do know what you mean.
I would take our Empire over theirs any day.
Yes, I would take the Sith Empire over this one any day.
[Flirt] You missed me.
[Flirt] You missed me.
You were looking for me all that time.
Is it really any surprise?
I thought you said....
Thought who said what?
Nothing. It's--I made a mistake. I'll keep looking for the... thing....
You probably haven't seen one in here.... I'll keep looking.
I suppose I should get back to healing.
I should continue my meditation.
We might not always agree, but you're my ally. I would even venture to call you my friend.
